thread.title: Sources Say: Jasper Johnson is a Kentucky Wildcat
thread.title_full: Sources Say: Jasper Johnson is a Kentucky Wildcat

author: Jack Pilgrim
title: Sources Say: Jasper Johnson is a Kentucky Wildcat
text:
Sources Say: Jasper Johnson is a Kentucky Wildcat
Jasper Johnson is a Kentucky Wildcat, choosing to stay home over opportunities at Alabama, Arkansas, North Carolina and Louisville. It’s a massive addition for Mark Pope and his staff alongside Malachi Moreno, giving UK two pledges two months ahead of the early signing period — both top-25 prospects.
What does his commitment mean for the Cats? How did we get here? And most importantly, what’s next for Kentucky as it look to build on this recruiting momentum going into the fall?
Sources Say is here to break it all down, episode 349 now LIVE on the KSR YouTube page. Take a look:
You can find all past and future episodes of the show by subscribing to the official Sources Say Podcast feed on iTunes
right here.
Not on iTunes listener? You can also subscribe to the
show on Spotify.
Special thanks to our sponsors!
Club Blue is hosting a tailgate before the South Carolina game for members. The Men’s basketball team and coaching staff will be there to interact and tailgate with Club Blue members. Tailgate is 1pm – 3pm. Club Blue members will receive invitations via email or text to register. Space is limited, so while free, registration is first come / first serve until sports are full. So members will need to keep on eye open for the invitation. Anyone who signs up to become a Club Blue member over the next few days will be eligible for an invite.
Club Blue is the official collective partner of the University of Kentucky. Subscribe today at
www.clubbluenil.com
